Description: Trade Union Cooperative Insurance (known as: Trade Union) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since February 2008. Trade Union operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, Bahrain and Lebanon, working on Reinsurance and Property and Banks. Trade Union is based in Khobar, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 2008.

Shareholder Name: National Amlak for Investment Holding Co
